name: @splitsoftware/browser-rum-agent
description: Split Software RUM Agent for Browsers.

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:dist
scripts.build:esm: rimraf esm && tsc --project config/tsconfig.json -outDir esm -m es6 && replace @VERSION@ $npm_package_version esm/utils/context.js
scripts.build:cjs: rimraf cjs && tsc --project config/tsconfig.json  -outDir cjs -m commonjs && replace @VERSION@ $npm_package_version cjs/utils/context.js
scripts.check: npm run check:lint && npm run check:types
scripts.test: npm run test:ts-decls && npm run test:karma && npm run test:jest
scripts.all: npm run check && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.publish:rc: npm run check && npm run build && npm publish --tag rc
scripts.publish:stable: npm run check && npm run build && npm publish

author: nicolas.zelaya@split.io
